General.Name: SD Standard Drilling PLC
General.Description: S.D. Standard ETC Plc operates in the shipping, offshore, and energy sectors. The company controls a fleet of nine platform supply vessels (PSVs) comprising three large-sized, one medium-sized, and five medium-sized PSVs with 51% ownership interest. It focuses on investment portfolio within the energy, transport, and commodities markets. The company was formerly known as S.D. Standard Drilling Plc and changed its name to S.D. Standard ETC Plc in February 2022. S.D. Standard ETC Plc was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Limassol, Cyprus.
